title: Ping Issues with solid connection
body: Basically 2 weeks ago I started having really high ping during some of my games(130 - 750).My connection is always ok and even though this issue is being checked by Riot they havn't come out with a specific answer, they did find out using a TRACERT that the connection becomes really bad once it leaves my ISP servers, so I'm asking the community if anyone had the same problem or if anyone has any clue on how to fix such an issue.

replies.body: It only starts having those high pings after leaving your ISP? Hmmmm kinda sounds like there may be some kind of damaged node along the route your ISP is sending your connection. In these cases you might be able to use a VPN to get a smoother connection for now, but this should only be a temporary solution until your ISP is doing better.
